1370: Dodo was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 19 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Gertrudis, Dodo, at age 20.
1373: Had a son with Gertrudis, Ringot, at age 22.
1377: Had a son with Gertrudis, Justaes, at age 26.
1378: Had a son with Gertrudis, Huwardo, at age 27.
1380: Lost his wife Gertrudis while she was giving birth to Gelmarus in 1380.
Lost son Gelmarus when Gelmarus was 1 years old.
1392: Lost son Ringot when Ringot was 20 years old.
